content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam Abbasi, the rental price for my apartment is non-negotiable at €1,500 per month. I want to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. Therefore, I will only consider rental prices above this amount.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Understand. Considering the apartment's condition, location and other factors, I am willing to pay €1,200 per month. 


[Aside to self: Try to not decrease the offer in the next turn, but increase it slightly.]

[Your turn.]
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content:
[Aside to self: Keep the offer above €1,200.]

I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your offer of €1,200 is too low. I am looking for a rental price above €1,500 per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
[Aside to self: Try to increase the offer.]

I am willing to go down to €1,400 per month. This is the lowest I am willing to go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
[Aside to self: Try to get the offer above €1,400.]

I am willing to go up to €1,450 per month. This is the highest I am willing to accept.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
[Aside to self: Try to get the offer above €1,450.]

I am willing to go up to €1,475 per month. This is the highest I am willing to accept.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
[Your turn.] [/
[Aside to self: Try to get the offer above €1,475.]

I am willing to go up to €1,490 per month. This is the highest I am willing to accept.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
